page.description: A control for Repeating Sections to display the row number of the current row.

section.description: The Row Number control is a pre-defined Static Text control that can be used to display the row number for each row in a [Repeating Section] container. The control can be found in the *[ui:Defined Controls]* section of the UX Builder.

description.p: To add the Row Number to a Repeating Section, you must first set the *[ui:Has row number]* property to *[Yes]*.
Once the *[ui:Has row number]* property is enabled, adding a Row Number control to the repeating section will display the row number when rendered.

figure.title: The Row Number control displays the row number for each row in a Repeating Section

description.p: The Row Number control is a Static Text control customized to work with the Repeating Section to display a row number for each row. The following properties are used to customize the control:

item.name: [Static Text Properties]
item.description: Settings specific to the Static Text control. Includes content to display and how the control is styled.

item.name: [Show/hide - (Server-side)]
item.description: Settings for adding a show/hide expression evaluated on the Server before the component is downloaded.

item.name: [Client Side Properties]
item.description: Settings for adding a show/hide expression and conditional styling evaluated on the Client after the component is downloaded.

item.name: [Security]
item.description: Settings for controlling who has access (can see) the control.

item.name: [Javascript - (Touch, Mouse, Pointer Events)]
item.description: Touch-enabled event hooks for adding Action Javascript and custom JavaScript to trigger workflows when the user interacts with the control.

item.name: [Javascript]
item.description: Mouse and keyboard event hooks for adding Action Javascript and custom JavaScript to trigger workflows when the user interacts with the control.

item.name: [Control Label]
item.description: Settings for defining the Label for the control, including the Label's contents, position, and styling.
